inclusion.criterion: Healthy infants as determined by medical history, physical examination and judgment of the Investigator
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Informed consent form has been signed and dated by the parent(s) or other legally acceptable representative (and by an independent witness if required by local regulations)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject and parent/legally acceptable representative are able to attend all scheduled visits and to comply with all study procedures
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Covered by health insurance according to local regulations
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Receipt of any vaccine in the 4 weeks preceding the first study vaccination or planned receipt of any vaccine in the 4 weeks before and/or following any study vaccination except for influenza vaccination and rotavirus vaccination, which may be received at a gap of at least 2 weeks before or 2 weeks after any study vaccines
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has been previously vaccinated with meningococcal group ACWY conjugate vaccine and meningococcal group B vaccine, which may trigger exclusion. However, the overall assessment is likely ineligible due to other exclusion criteria.
